content: What is the minimum condition for a Mark visit?
Customer should be Geo-verified for Mark Visit.
How can I submit a Mark visit?
Mark visit can be submitted through the 'Mark Visit' section in the portal by authorized users.
Can I mark a visit for a non-registered customer?
Yes, you can submit a Mark visit for a non-registered customer by selecting the 'Non-Registered customer mark visit' option.
What does a failed Mark visit mean?
A Mark visit is considered failed if there is a discrepancy between the customer's and the visitor's latitude and longitude.
Who can submit a Mark visit?
Mark visits can be submitted by authorized users from FR, BP, AM, ZM, NSM, and HO based on their zone or region.
Where can I view the details of a completed visit?
You can view the details of a completed visit by accessing the 'Visit Report' section in the portal under the 'Completed Visits' tab.
How do I access the Mark visit report?
To access the Mark visit report, go to the 'MIS Report' section and select 'Mark Visit' to view the summary.
What is the role of NSM in the Mark visit process?
NSM can perform the Mark visit for customers within their assigned region.
Can I update a Mark visit after it has been submitted?
Once a Mark visit is submitted, it cannot be updated. Please ensure all details are correct before submission.
How do I know if a Mark visit was successfully submitted?
You will receive a confirmation message in the portal once the Mark visit is successfully submitted.
Who can perform the Mark visit for a customer in a different region?
HO users have the authority to perform Mark visits for customers across all regions.
